display.title: Multiblock Miner
description: Yeah, we admit it... this Multiblock is entirely &&doptional&&r. Many playtesters kept using their &&6HV&&r singleblock miners and didn't run into any issues with regards to throughput.

However, the &&3Large Miner&&r will further boost your returns when collecting ores from veins. Ores are mined as if they were &&amacerated&&r, but they yield &&6three times&&r as many &&dCrushed ores&&r.
You'll need to automate &&aDrilling Fluid&&r before you run this. You might also want to use a &&3Quantum Tunnel&&r from AE2 and &&3GTEU P2P Tunnels&&r to transfer items and provide power.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o There were some interesting side effects when we ported this over from Gregicality, as the multiblock actually originated from GregTech 5.

&&oIts current implementation isn't perfect, as you don't really get much of a benefit by upgrading this miner to the advanced versions. We were considering a rebalance of energy consumption and yield per tier.
